title: Na2O2 + S - element that is reduced in reaction

content.question: Atoms of which element are reduced in the reaction?

choices.label: S; each atom loses four electrons
Na in Na2O2; each atom loses one electron
O in Na2O2; each atom gains one electron
O in H2O; each atom gains one electron

content.answer: O in Na2O2; each atom gains one electron

skill.text: 1.B: Describe the components of and quantitative information from models and representations that illustrate both particulate-level and macroscopic- level properties.
